entry.title: Basic Statistics with Python
entry.summary:
Description

DAY1 Track5 3 Aris Budi Wibowo / arisbuw Basic Statistics with Python

slide : https://github.com/pythonkr/pyconapac-2016-files/raw/master/20160813-105-12-ArisBudiWibowo.pdf

https://www.pycon.kr/2016apac/program/12

We know that in this era of data flowing everywhere, we need to try to understand them in order to make decisions. Python is a powerful language that can be used for this purpose. In this presentation, I will introduce some popular libraries like pandas, scipy, and numpy that will help us to understand data. And then I will discuss about some next level approach if we want to level up our game.
